oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gypsum-based management practises to prevent phosphorus transportation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pietola, Liisa
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Air and water emissions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Significant agricultural P load decrease on waters is observed. Practical methods to achieve the load decrease is developed; provide solutions for farmers, are included into the Finnish agri-environmental support scheme. Practical methods includes: gypsum as soil amendment for erosion and soluble P control, gypsum-based precipitate in manure treatment to fractionate P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Pietola, Liisa (2008) Gypsum-based management practises to prevent phosphorus transportation. Paper at: Phosphorus management in Nordic-Baltic agriculture - reconciling productivity and environmental protection : NJF seminar 401, 22-23.9.2008.
